response.overview: The Welding Emperor, champion of ten consecutive World Welding Championships, was caught in a bomb explosion while welding something. He went missing, leading many to believe he'd fallen! Three years later, with the World Welding Championships about to begin, a sponsor descended upon the Qingcheng Steel Plant, seeking a welding master to represent the country. They stumbled upon an apprentice with exceptional welding skills. After a series of twists and turns, they discovered that this unassuming apprentice was none other than the former Welding Emperor!
response.tagline: Everyone thought he was dead, but the legendary man is back!
response.title: Emperor Of Welding
